sentences.sentence: Other diseases of old age—de we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao ia, stroke, arteriosclerosis and emphysema—are also troubling fewer and fewer people.
sentences.translation: 越来越少的人为其它如痴呆症、中风、动脉硬化和肺气肿等老年疾病感到困扰了。

sentences.sentence: The objective was to assess the relationship between cornea arcus senilis and blood fat & arteriosclerosis.
sentences.translation: 目的是探讨角膜老年环与血脂及动脉硬化的关系。

sentences.sentence: Finally, lower your daily intake of salt, which will minimize your risk of arteriosclerosis.
sentences.translation: 最后，每天减少盐的摄入量，可以减小动脉硬化的危险。
